# FileDocument.WriteConfiguration

**Type Alias**

The configuration for writing document contents.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias WriteConfiguration = FileDocumentWriteConfiguration
```

## Discussion

This type is an alias for [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FileDocumentWriteConfiguration], which contains a content type and a file wrapper that you use to access the contents of a document file, if one already exists. You get a value of this type as an input to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FileDocument/fileWrapper(configuration:)] method.

## Writing a document

- **fileWrapper(configuration:)**: Serializes a document snapshot to a file wrapper.
- **writableContentTypes**: The file types that the document supports saving or exporting to.
